jd: From: Charan, Anveta charan@anveta.com Reply to: charan@anveta.com Role: JBPM Engineer Location: Dallas, TX Duration: 6+ Months Job description: Looking for 8 years of JBPM engineer Architect and implement solutions using JBPM and Java, ensuring scalability and performance. Design and manage databases using Cassandra and Oracle, ensuring data integrity and optimization. Design Workflow, parallel threading etc. Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Implementing and configuring JBPM components, such as process definitions, rules, and forms. Integrating JBPM with other systems and technologies, such as databases and web services. Troubleshooting and resolving issues related to JBPM workflows and processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java development, microservices architecture, and database management, along with expertise in deployment using Kubernetes.
